text: Wang Dapeng (; born 3 December 1996) is a Chinese recurve archer from Huangdao District in Qingdao.http://2016.163.com/16/0715/16/BS1F2DQQ00050I18.html He represented China in the archery competition at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Chinese male archers Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Archers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic archers of China
title: Wang Dapeng
